titleStmt.title: SII 7.780: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 780. (A.R. No. 155 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrīḥ . rājakesaripaṉmarāṉa tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ tillaittirunakar ciṟappuṭaittākat tirumuṭicūṭiya śrīkulottuṅkacoḻatevaṟkku yāṇṭu 8vatu meṣanāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣattu pañcamiyun tiṅkaṭ kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Uttiraṭṭāti nāḷ jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu Utavittirumāṇikuḻiuṭai
ya ṉāyaṉār koyil tāṉattāṟku makaṉār tirunakṣatramāṉa Uttiraṭṭāti nāḷ tirttam prasādikka Eḻuntaruḷukiṟa cittiraittirunāḷukkum vikkramacoḻaṉcantikkum Amutupaṭi cāttuppaṭi Uḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nittanivantaṅkaḷukku viṭṭa Irācarācavaḷanāṭṭu meṟkānāṭṭu tiyākavalliccaruppetimaṅkalattu melpiṭākai Ālaippā
kkattu veṟupiṟintu Etirilicoḻanallūreṉṟu namperāl veṟupiṟinta Ūruṇivākkālukku vaṭakku natta melācaṟutikkuk kiḻakku nāraikāṟkaḻikku meṟku kuṟaikkāṭṭellai teṉṉācaṟutikku teṟku nāṉkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa nilam Aṟupattiraṇṭu mā mukkāṇiyum Iṉṉāṟpāṟkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa nattamum Iṟaiyili tirunāmattukkā
ṇiyākap paṇṭuṭaiyāṉpakkale vilaikoṇṭu cantirātittavarai cella Iṟaiyili tirunāmattukkāṇiyākat tantom Ippaṭikku nāṟpāṟkellaikkum tiruccūlatāparamum paṇṇi kallilum veṭṭikkoḷka tiruveḻuttu Ivai toṇṭaimāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai vāṇātarāyaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai muṉaiyataraiyaṉ Eḻuttu .

app.note: vatu is expressed both in letters and by symbol.

div.p: Digital edition of SII 7.780 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
